title: Myron Rolle Has Big Questions About the Game of Football (Podcast)
itunes:title: Myron Rolle Has Big Questions About the Game of Football (Podcast)
description:
He's a Rhodes Scholar, a former professional football player and now a neurosurgeon on the front lines of a global pandemic. What can't Myron Rolle do? The former Florida State standout joins for a candid and personal conversation about the state of the game and the state of the worldwide health crisis. He talks about his family -- the extended one for whom football is the family business, and his own growing brood, including his twins born just a couple months back.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
